summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Block 3 and 4, West Queen Anne Addition, being the alley between 5th Avenue West and 6th Avenue West from West McGraw Street to West Smith Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14434 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
